hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)# and #a Purple Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Saria's Song#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #0# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: This Gossip Stone Is Dedicated to Those Who Perished Before Ganon Was Defeated.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Wallet#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Epona's Song# and #Din's Fire#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Saria's Song#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Deku Stick#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Small Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Third Right Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Nocturne of Shadow#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Left Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Fire Temple Compass#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Clear Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple First Mirror Left Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #a Map of the Water Temple# and #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Forest Temple#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #5# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Bombchu Shop#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Hookshot#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Hookshot#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Did you know that you only need to play the Song of Time to open the Door of Time? The Spiritual Stones are not needed.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.
